product_name: Camaro Mono Voltage Wetsuit - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for warmer water temperatures, the women's Camaro Mono Voltage Wetsuit improves your comfort when playing in the surf or heading out for a long swim. 3mm neoprene features a formfitting silhouette that provides freedom of movement and non-bulky comfort. Asymmetric front zipper ensures a comfortable fit and the zipperless back allows good range of motion. Extra-durable flatlock seams won't irritate your skin. Stretchy zones improve range of motion. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for warmer water temperatures, the women's Camaro Mono Voltage Wetsuit improves your comfort when playing in the surf or heading out for a long swim.
